Articles.Content: Question is in the title, it\'ll be pointless posting to spacecraft exchange if that\'s not the case.

Well, the most recent version of the game is 0.14.4, but that doesn\'t matter too much. I think if you change the version number in the .craft file to 0.14.4 it will probably work, but I\'m not sure.

Feel free to put up the files anyways; just make sure you make a note of what version it\'s from.

Mine work, I had to rebuild most when the build order bug in the experimental releases messed everything up but my current stock ships work in 0.13.3 and 0.14.4.

Most mods should also work but if you get any problems it can be hard to figure out which mod caused it.

If I\'m reading between the lines correctly, you don\'t have the paid KSP yet.

It\'s highly recommended at this time to re-build old rocket designs in the newest version, to avoid issues with conversions and whatnot. I suggest that you put up a 'How to build' guide in with the .craft file, so that people who have .14.4 can try out your ships
To put it simply yes. 13.3 crafts work in 14.4 8)
